origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CryptoAPI.get_research_articles', 'description': 'This function retrieves research articles based on the cryptocurrency name, article type, and the number of articles to fetch.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'cryptoName', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the cryptocurrency.'}, {'name': 'articleType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of articles to fetch, e.g., financial_oracle, technical_analysis.'}, {'name': 'articleCount', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The number of articles to retrieve.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'articles', 'description': 'A list of research articles.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CryptoAPI.get_research_articles, 它的参数输入如下: 'cryptoName'是'Chainlink', 'articleType'是'financial_oracle', 'articleCount'是'3'.
